bibl.title: 'Magna in latitudine earum differentia' (Pliny, NH XIII, 78).
bibl.note: À propos de: Eric G. Turner, An Open Letter to Dr. I. Hendriks, ZPE 39 (1983) pp. 113-114. - Latitudo is the important dimension of the roll, i.e. the one which we today call "height".
bibl.seg: Bülow-Jacobsen Adam, 'Magna in latitudine earum differentia' (Pliny, NH XIII, 78).
À propos de: Eric G. Turner, An Open Letter to Dr. I. Hendriks, ZPE 39 (1983) pp. 113-114. - Latitudo is the important dimension of the roll, i.e. the one which we today call "height".
